mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM t_profile WHERE profile_id = #{profileId}

SELECT JSON_OBJECTAGG(subject_name,keyword_name_list) AS keywords FROM ( SELECT s.subject_name, JSON_ARRAYAGG(k.keyword_name) AS keyword_name_list FROM t_profile p INNER JOIN t_user_account u on u.user_id = p.user_id INNER JOIN t_m_user_keyword muk ON u.user_id = muk.user_id INNER JOIN t_keyword k ON muk.keyword_id = k.keyword_id INNER JOIN t_subject s ON k.subject_id = s.subject_id WHERE p.profile_id = #{profileId} GROUP BY s.subject_name )tb_json_arrayagg

SELECT ua.user_nick_name AS userNickName, p.profile_image_url AS imgUrl, ua.user_grade AS userGrade, p.profile_intro AS profileIntro, p.profile_contents AS profileContents, p.profile_contact_phone AS profileContactPhone, p.profile_contact_chat AS profileContactChat FROM t_profile p INNER JOIN t_user_account ua ON p.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE p.profile_id = #{profileId}

SELECT p.profile_id AS profileId, ua.user_nick_name AS name, p.profile_image_url AS profileImg, ua.user_grade AS grade, p.profile_intro AS intro, p.profile_contents AS contents, GROUP_CONCAT(k.keyword_name) AS keywords FROM t_profile p INNER JOIN t_user_account ua ON p.user_id = ua.user_id LEFT JOIN t_m_user_keyword muk ON ua.user_id = muk.user_id LEFT JOIN t_keyword k ON muk.keyword_id = k.keyword_id WHERE p.profile_id = #{profileId} GROUP BY p.profile_id
mapper.update: UPDATE t_profile SET profile_image_url = #{profileImageUrl} where user_id = #{userId}

UPDATE t_profile SET profile_intro = #{request.profileIntro}, profile_contents = #{request.profileContents}, profile_contact_phone = #{request.profileContactPhone}, profile_contact_chat = #{request.profileContactChat}, profile_active_flag = 1 WHERE profile_id = #{profileId};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_possible_time WHERE possible_date_id IN (SELECT possible_date_id FROM t_possible_date WHERE profile_id = #{profileId});
